name: Pesto Caprese Bites with Balsamic Reduction
recipeIngredient: 8 pieces Wasa Multi Grain Crispbread (may substitute other Wasa varieties)

recipeInstructions.text: To make the balsamic reduction, add balsamic vinegar to a small saucepan over medium heat. Bring to a boil until thick and reduced, about 4-5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: To make the balsamic reduction, add balsamic vinegar to a small saucepan over medium heat. Bring to a boil until thick and reduced, about 4-5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: To assemble the bites, generously spread 1 tablespoon pesto on each Wasa Crispbread. Top with 2 slices mozzarella, 2 slices tomatoes and basil leaves. Drizzle with balsamic reduction.
recipeInstructions.name: To assemble the bites, generously spread 1 tablespoon pesto on each Wasa Crispbread. Top with 2 slices mozzarella, 2 slices tomatoes and basil leaves. Drizzle with balsamic reduction.
